Container.Name: Compressarr
Container.Description: A tool that integrates with Radarr and Sonarr and used FFmpeg to recompress items from your library
Container.Overview: Compressarr is an application to take a filtered set of media from Radarr or (eventaully) Sonarr and process it with customisable FFmpeg presets.

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: This is where Compressarr will store it's configuration.

Config.Name: Media directory
Config.Description: This needs to be the same as the root for Radarr/Sonarr. Create more as required

Config.Name: Output directory
Config.Description: This is an output directory, Radarr/Sonarr needs to see this for importing to work

Config.Name: Debug Level
Config.Description: Log Level used to output. https://tinyurl.com/yh3tna6k
